detectors.description:

elements.name: balanceOf[msg.sender] = balanceOf[msg.sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BitcashPay.sellBitcashPayAgainstEther(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#354-370):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#362)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] = balanceOf[msg.sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#364)
	- balanceOf[owner] = balanceOf[owner].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#365)
	- denyDirectTransfer() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#368)
		- directTransferAllowed = false (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#277)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#367)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [BitcashPay.sellBitcashPayAgainstEther(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L354-L370):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.transfer(refund_amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L362)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balanceOf[msg.sender] = balanceOf[msg.sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L364)
	- [balanceOf[owner] = balanceOf[owner].add(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L365)
	- [denyDirectTransfer()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L368)
		- [directTransferAllowed = false](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L277)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Transfer(address(this),msg.sender,amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcashPay.sol#L367)
